title: 服务器开不了了，怎么办？
author: IsaacWangTT
txt_content:
电脑64位
windows10
报错:Error occurred during initialization of VM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap
求解决

replies.author: fanglys
replies.txt_content: 你运行批处理文件里的内存是不是填得超出电脑内存值大了。

replies.author: HYJTOBY
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: IsaacWangTT
replies.txt_content:
fanglys 发表于 2018-8-29 18:34
你运行批处理文件里的内存是不是填得超出电脑内存值大了。
好了，谢谢。我这里4G调成2G就解决了
